description: Turn your phone into the ultimate Golf GPS distance finder and scoring device with GolfPinFinder. Get instant access to thousands golf courses and the ability to easily add your favorite golf courses online or from your device for free. Download golf courses directly over the air or save them to your device. Setup your golf clubs for accurate club recommendations, mark your shots and email your scorecard after the round. & GolfPinFinder gives GPS distances for the front, center and back of the green, tee box, hole hints and up to 5 custom points per hole is included. Keep score for up to 4 players per round and let GolfPinFinder track all your golf statistics such as Greens in Regulation, Fairways in Regulation, Putts per hole, automatic Skins tracking, game points, etc. & Now you can sync your data to GolfPinFinder.com to prevent data loss! Current weather conditions, provided by WeatherBug, can be displayed while playing and includes a check for severe weather alerts in your area.
